ERROR.SUBMIT_CONTACT_FORM: Error, Could Not Submit A Contact Form

ERROR.END_DATE_BEFORE: End Date cannot be the same or before Start Date
ERROR.FIELD_AREA: Field crop area cannot be greater than field area

ERROR.ADD: Failed to add farm, please contact litefarm for assistance
ERROR.FETCH: failed to fetch farm from database

ERROR.GENERAL: failed to add fieldCrop to database
ERROR.VARIETY_EXISTS: A crop with that variety name already exists, please try another.

ERROR.LOGIN_ERROR: Error in reset password page, please contact LiteFarm for assistance.

ERROR.ASSIGN_ALL_CROPS: Please assign crops or fields for each task
ERROR.ASSIGN_ALL_MINUTES: Please assign all your available work minutes
ERROR.CROP_FIELDS_EACH: Please assign crops or fields for each task
ERROR.DURATION_FOR_CROPS: Please assign a duration for each crop.
ERROR.ONE_TASK: Please select at least one task.
ERROR.ONLY_INTEGERS_DURATIONS: Please assign only numbers to durations
ERROR.SUBMIT_SHIFT: Submit shift with crops failed. Litefarm's issue.
ERROR.USER_FOR_SHIFT: Please select a user for this shift
ERROR.VALID_START_END: Please enter a valid start-end duration

ERROR.EXISTS: User already exists in LiteFarm Network
ERROR.INVITE: Error creating user account, please contact LiteFarm for assistance.
ERROR.RESET_PASSWORD: Error with sending password reset email, please contact LiteFarm for assistance.
ERROR.RESTORE: There was an error restoring access
ERROR.REVOKE: There was an error revoking access
